reqs:
You must also register for a discussion section FIST 220, D11. If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - FIST 220, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/
This is a discussion section for FIST 220, Section 001. You must be registered in the primary section in order to register in the discussion.
Students must also sign up for a discussion section FIST 220 D21 or D22. If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - FIST 220, Section WL2. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/
This is a discussion section for FIST 220, Section 002. You must be registered in the primary section in order to register in the discussion.

description: Analysis of the aesthetics, economics, history and technological characteristics of the Classical Hollywood period.
